00001 /* bpred-2lev.cpp: 2-Level predictor (GAg, GAp, PAg, PAp, gshare, pshare)
00002    [Yeh and Patt, MICRO 1991; McFarling DEC-WRL TN36]  */
00003 /*
00004  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00005  */
00006 
00007 #include <math.h>
00008 #define COMPONENT_NAME "2lev"
00009 
00010 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00011 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00012 {
00013   int l1_size;
00014   int l2_size;
00015   int his_width;
00016   int Xor;
00017 
00018   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d:%d:%d:%d",name,&l1_size,&l2_size,&his_width,&Xor) != 5)
00019     fatal("bad bpred options string %s (should be \"2lev:name:l1_size:l2_size:his_width:xor\")",opt_string);
00020   return new bpred_2lev_t(name,l1_size,l2_size,his_width,Xor);
00021 }
00022 #else
00023 
00024 class bpred_2lev_t:public bpred_dir_t
00025 {
00026   class bpred_2lev_sc_t:public bpred_sc_t
00027   {
00028     public:
00029     my2bc_t * current_ctr;
00030     int * bhr;
00031     int lookup_bhr;
00032   };
00033 
00034   protected:
00035 
00036   int bht_size;
00037   int bht_mask;
00038   int * bht;
00039   int pht_size;
00040   int pht_mask;
00041   my2bc_t * pht;
00042   int history_length;
00043   int history_mask;
00044   int Xor; /* all lower-case "xor" is reserved keyword in C++. yuck! >:-P */
00045   int xorshift;
00046 
00047   public:
00048 
00049   /* CREATE */
00050   bpred_2lev_t(char * const arg_name,
00051                const int arg_bht_size,
00052                const int arg_pht_size,
00053                const int arg_history_length,
00054                const int arg_Xor
00055               )
00056   {
00057     init();
00058 
00059     /* verify arguments are valid */
00060     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_bht_size);
00061     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_pht_size);
00062     CHECK_NNEG(arg_history_length);
00063     CHECK_BOOL(arg_Xor);
00064 
00065     name = strdup(arg_name);
00066     if(!name)
00067       fatal("couldn't malloc 2lev name (strdup)");
00068     type = strdup("2lev");
00069     if(!type)
00070       fatal("couldn't malloc 2lev type (strdup)");
00071 
00072     bht_size = arg_bht_size;
00073     bht_mask = arg_bht_size-1;
00074     pht_size = arg_pht_size;
00075     pht_mask = arg_pht_size-1;
00076     history_length = arg_history_length;
00077     history_mask = (1<<arg_history_length)-1;
00078     Xor = arg_Xor;
00079     if(Xor)
00080     {
00081       xorshift = log_base2(pht_size)-history_length;
00082       if(xorshift < 0)
00083         xorshift = 0;
00084     }
00085 
00086     bht = (int*) calloc(bht_size,sizeof(*bht));
00087     if(!bht)
00088       fatal("couldn't malloc 2lev BHT");
00089     pht = (my2bc_t*) calloc(pht_size,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00090     if(!pht)
00091       fatal("couldn't malloc 2lev PHT");
00092     for(int i=0;i<pht_size;i++)
00093       pht[i] = (i&1)?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00094 
00095     bits = bht_size*history_length + pht_size*2;
00096   }
00097 
00098   /* DESTROY */
00099   ~bpred_2lev_t()
00100   {
00101     if(pht) free(pht); pht = NULL;
00102     if(bht) free(bht); bht = NULL;
00103   }
00104 
00105   /* LOOKUP */
00106   BPRED_LOOKUP_HEADER
00107   {
00108     class bpred_2lev_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_2lev_sc_t*) scvp;
00109     int l1index = PC&bht_mask;
00110     int l2index;
00111     sc->bhr = &bht[l1index];
00112 
00113     if(Xor)
00114     {
00115       l2index = PC^(*sc->bhr<<xorshift);
00116     }
00117     else
00118     {
00119       l2index = (PC<<history_length)|*sc->bhr;
00120     }
00121 
00122     l2index &= pht_mask;
00123 
00124     sc->current_ctr = &pht[l2index];
00125     sc->updated = false;
00126 
00127     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00128     sc->lookup_bhr = *sc->bhr;
00129 
00130     return MY2BC_DIR(*sc->current_ctr);
00131   }
00132 
00133   /* UPDATE */
00134   BPRED_UPDATE_HEADER
00135   {
00136     class bpred_2lev_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_2lev_sc_t*) scvp;
00137 
00138     MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->current_ctr,outcome);
00139 
00140     if(!sc->updated)
00141     {
00142       BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00143       BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00144       sc->updated = true;
00145     }
00146   }
00147 
00148   /* SPEC UPDATE */
00149   BPRED_SPEC_UPDATE_HEADER
00150   {
00151     class bpred_2lev_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_2lev_sc_t*) scvp;
00152 
00153     BPRED_STAT(spec_updates++;)
00154 
00155     *sc->bhr = ((*sc->bhr<<1)|our_pred)&history_mask;
00156   }
00157 
00158   BPRED_RECOVER_HEADER
00159   {
00160     class bpred_2lev_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_2lev_sc_t*) scvp;
00161     if(bht_size == 1) // global history recovery only
00162         bht[0] = (sc->lookup_bhr<<1)|outcome;
00163   }
00164 
00165   BPRED_FLUSH_HEADER
00166   {
00167     class bpred_2lev_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_2lev_sc_t*) scvp;
00168     if(bht_size == 1) // global history recovery only
00169         bht[0] = sc->lookup_bhr;
00170   }
00171 
00172   /* GETCACHE */
00173   BPRED_GET_CACHE_HEADER
00174   {
00175     class bpred_2lev_sc_t * sc = new bpred_2lev_sc_t();
00176     if(!sc)
00177       fatal("couldn't malloc 2lev State Cache");
00178     return sc;
00179   }
00180 
00181 };
00182 
00183 #endif /* BPRED_PARSE_ARGS */
00184 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
